title: How to Set Up the Wii U's TV Remote Function

steps.headline: Turn on your TV and cable or satellite box.
From the menu, go to "System Settings".
Press "Set Top-Box and TV".
steps.description: From there, choose the type of device that you are setting up.

steps.headline: Find the first letter of the device manufacturer's name, and locate the name from the list.
Test the function by pressing the red "Cable Power" button.
If the test works, click "Worked" and then "OK" to finish the setup.

text: Turn on your TV and cable or satellite box.  Turn on your Wii U.  From the menu, go to "System Settings".  Go to "TV Remote Function".  Press "Set Top-Box and TV". From there, choose the type of device that you are setting up. Find the first letter of the device manufacturer's name, and locate the name from the list.  Test the function by pressing the red "Cable Power" button.  If the test works, click "Worked" and then "OK" to finish the setup.
